MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA8 postcode area of Erskine. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.52pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20pm on Wednesday, 07 April 2021
